ticket.title: HEF: Topic->trigger mapping for Work and Gate events

tickets.reason: Base protocol infrastructure required before topic mapping
Outbox and pulse publisher must exist before topic->trigger mapping

in_scope: Map WorkEvent kernel events to work.<work_id>.events pulse topics
Map GateReceipt kernel events to gate.<work_id>.<changeset_digest>.<gate_id> pulse topics
Add changeset_digest->work_id mapping via PolicyResolvedForChangeSet index
Populate gate topics using PolicyResolvedForChangeSet lookup
out_of_scope: Episode lifecycle, tool, or IO event mappings (covered by TCK-00306)
Topic grammar or wildcard matching (covered by TCK-00301)

steps: Review existing ledger event structures for WorkEvent and GateReceipt
Implement PolicyResolvedForChangeSet lookup to extract work_id from changeset_digest
Create topic derivation logic for work.<work_id>.events from WorkEvent
Create topic derivation logic for gate.<work_id>.<changeset_digest>.<gate_id> from GateReceipt
Wire topic derivation into pulse mapping logic in protocol module
Add unit tests for topic derivation from Work and Gate events
Verify gate pulse includes correct work_id derived from PolicyResolvedForChangeSet

criteria: Gate pulse includes work_id derived from PolicyResolvedForChangeSet.

notes.verification: Topic derivation must be deterministic and testable
